statements: UPDATE GenomicVariations SET gene_name = 'BRCA1', zygosity = 'homozygous', population_frequency = 0.05 WHERE variant_id = 'f28ca7de-eb6d-49a1-a1a2-4a4a8606d35b';
UPDATE GenomicVariations SET ref_allele = 'G', alt_allele = 'T', chromosome = 'chr3', position = 14567 WHERE variant_id = 'afb52d08-ec38-4e7d-b172-1a9171f3ef38';
UPDATE GenomicVariations SET population_frequency = 0.15, zygosity = 'Homozygous', ref_allele = 'A' WHERE variant_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174001';
UPDATE GenomicVariations SET gene_name = 'BRCA1', position = 10254, alt_allele = 'G', chromosome = '11', population_frequency = 0.05 WHERE gene_name = 'TP53' AND zygosity = 'Heterozygous';
UPDATE genomic_variations SET variation_name = 'SNP123', gene_name = 'BRCA1' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE genetic_diseases SET description = 'This disease is caused by a genetic mutation.' WHERE disease_name = 'Hemochromatosis';
UPDATE genomic_variations SET variation_name = 'Substitution', start_position = 100, end_position = 200 WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE genetic_diseases SET description = 'This disease is hereditary and has genetic components.', disease_name = 'Cystic Fibrosis' WHERE affected_gene = 'CFTR';
UPDATE genetic_variations SET position = 500, variation_name = 'New Variation' WHERE id = 1;

UPDATE patients SET gender = 'Female', age = 35 WHERE genetic_variation_id = 4

UPDATE Diseases SET diagnostic_method = 'Genetic testing' WHERE disease_id = 3;

UPDATE Gene SET gene_name = 'BRCA1', chromosome = '17', start_position = 1000, end_position = 2000 WHERE gene_id = 1;
